description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Goku Dies! There's Only One Last Chance.

Japanese: Gokū Shisu! Rasuto Chansu wa Ichido dake (悟空死す！ラストチャンスは一度だけ)

Gohan unleashes a mighty attack that not even Radtiz can resist! But as quickly as his power appears, it vanishes. When Raditz prepares to strike back, Goku must make the ultimate sacrifice to save his son!
name: Gohan's Rage

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Even Yama-sama is Surprised — The Fight Continues in the Next World.

Japanese: Enmasama mo Bikkuri — Ano Yo de Faito (エンマ様もビックリあの世でファイト)

Piccolo takes Gohan into the wild for a harsh training program. Meanwhile, Goku embarks on a new adventure in the next world, as he travels the endless Snake Way to reach the legendary King Kai!
name: No Time Like the Present

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Survival with Dinosaurs! Gohan's Harsh Training.

Japanese: Kyōryū to Sabaibaru! Gohan no Tsurai Shugyō (恐竜とサバイバル！悟飯のツライ修行)

Gohan begins his first day of Piccolo’s training. Alone in the wilderness, he must quickly learn to take care of himself. But that isn’t easy when he’s tired, hungry - and being chased by bloodthirsty dinosaurs!
name: Day 1

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: A Great Transformation on a Moonlit Night! The Secret of Gohan's Power.

Japanese: Tsuki no Kagayaku Yoru ni Daihenshin! Gohan Pawā no Himitsu (月の輝く夜に大変身！悟飯パワーの秘密)

Korin wants Krillin, Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu to report for special training! Meanwhile, Gohan’s grueling training causes him to undergo a shocking transformation!
name: Gohan Goes Bananas!

deck: Detective Jim Corrigan asks John and Zed for help with a case involving a missing girl; Papa Midnite plots his revenge; the truth behind the rising darkness is revealed.
description: Detective Jim Corrigan asks John and Zed for help with a case involving a missing girl; Papa Midnite plots his revenge; the truth behind the rising darkness is revealed.
name: Waiting for the Man

has_staff_review.name: Constantine Episode 113: Waiting for the Man

name: In the Passing Rain, Or, How Can a Girl Have Reached Such Feelings? ~ Regenschauer
The Good, the Bad and the Cursed

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Sorry, Robot-san — The Desert of Vanishing Tears

Japanese: Gomen ne Robottosan Sabaku ni Kieta Namida. (ゴメンねロボットさん砂漠に消えた涙。)

To escape a pack of wild animals, Gohan ventures into an ancient cave, where he meets an old Capsule Corp robot. The robot has lived alone in the cave for over 30 years, and he’s not happy to have visitors!
name: The Strangest Robot

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Don't Cry, Gohan! His First Fight. Gohan Makes a Friend.

Japanese: Naku na Gohan! Hajimete no Tatakai. (泣くな悟飯！はじめての闘い)

Gohan’s wilderness adventure continues, as he makes a new dinosaur friend! He’s happy to finally have some company until he’s harshly reminded that not all dinosaurs are friendly!
name: A New Friend

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English:The Saiyans, Mightiest Warriors in the Universe, Awaken!

Japanese: Uchūichi no Kyōsenshi Saiyajin Mezameru! (宇宙一の強戦士サイヤ人めざめる！)

On planet Arlia, Vegeta and Nappa become prisoners of the tyrant king who rules the planet. After a brief scuffle with the monster Yeddy, the Arlians realize that the two Saiyans are more than they can handle.
name: Terror on Arlia

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Catnap on the Serpentine Road Goku Takes a Tumble - Home For Infinite Losers.

Japanese: Hebi no Michi de Inemuri Gokū ga Okkochiru (蛇の道でいねむり悟空が落っこちる)

Gohan spends his day tormenting a T-Rex. Across the planet, Tien and Chiaotzu find their training interrupted by Launch. Meanwhile, Goku tries to find King Kai on Snake Way.
name: Global Training

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Hands Off! Yama-sama's Secret Fruit.

Japanese: Te o Dasu na! Enmasama no Himitsu no Kudamono (手を出すな！エンマ様の秘密の果実)

Goku encounters two giant ogres who want nothing more than to use the hero as a play toy! If he can defeat their challenges, the ogres vow to show him the way back to Snake Way.
name: Goz and Mez

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English:Such Sweet Temptation! The Snake Princess-sama's Hospitality.

Japanese: Ama〜i Yūwaku! Hebihimesama no Omotenashi (あま～い誘惑！蛇姫さまのおもてなし)

Back on Snake Way, Goku comes across a house he believes might belong to King Kai! Unfortunately, the dwelling is inhabited by Princess Snake, and she’ll do anything to keep Goku as her prisoner forever!
name: Princess Snake

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Escape from Piccolo! Gohan Summons a Storm.

Japanese: Pikkoro kara no Dasshutsu! Arashi o Yobu Gohan (ピッコロからの脱出！嵐を呼ぶ悟飯)

Piccolo flies off the handle during his fight with Raditz and splits in two! Meanwhile, Gohan decides to take a raft across the sea to visit his mother, gets caught in a storm, and suddenly remembers that he can’t swim!
name: Dueling Piccolos

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Run, Gohan! Longing for Mount Paozu, Where Chichi is Waiting.

Japanese: Hashire Gohan! Chichi no Matsu Natsukashi no Paozu Yama (走れ悟飯！チチの待つなつかしのパオズ山)

Gohan finds shelter with a gang of orphans living on the run from meddling adults. The group’s leader hatches a plan to take the kids to a safer hiding place, but when the police show up everything goes wrong!
name: Plight of the Children

deck: Knuckles feels that the only reason Sonic always bests him is that Sonic has better luck. So, Knuckles tries to run out his bad luck and reset the luck balance of the universe by constantly putting himself in harm’s way.
name: Unlucky Knuckles

deck: The group feels beaten after living life on the road, but must continue to trudge along in spite of the changes they have incurred.
name: Them
The Solitary Cat / A Lonely Cat
The Demon Who Came in From the Cold

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: City of No Tomorrow! The Long Road to Victory.

Japanese: Asu Naki Machi! Shōri e no Tōi Michinori (明日なき街！勝利への遠い道のり)

Earth’s top warriors visit Kami’s Pendulum Room where the past, present, and future co-exist. After a trip back in time, they realize they’ll need to train harder to stand a chance against the approaching Saiyans.
name: Pendulum Room Peril

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Last Stop on the Serpentine Road! Are You Kaio-sama?

Japanese: Shūte〜n Hebi no Michi! Omē Kaiōsama ka? (終点～ん蛇の道！おめえ界王様か？)

Gohan continues training, but a full moon causes the young Saiyan to rampage out of control! Meanwhile, Goku makes it to the end of Snake Way only to mistake a friendly ape named Bubbles for King Kai!
name: The End of Snake Way

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English:The Battle with Gravity! Catch Bubbles-kun.

Japanese: Jūryoku to no Tatakai! Baburusukun o Tsukamaero (重力との戦い！バブルス君をつかまえろ)

The intense gravity of King Kai’s planet makes Goku’s training difficult, but when he learns that the Saiyans are used to extreme fighting conditions, Goku is inspired to give it his all. Will it be enough?
name: Defying Gravity

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: The Saiyan Legend Reborn! Goku's Roots.

Japanese: Yomigaeru Saiyajin Densetsu! Gokū no Rūtsu (よみがえるサイヤ人伝説！悟空のルーツ)

After Goku struggles to bash Gregory with a hammer, King Kai inspires him with the story of the Saiyan race - and offers to train him personally! Will it be enough to stop the looming Saiyan invasion?
name: Goku's Ancestors

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Come Forth, Shen Long! The Saiyans Finally Arrive on Earth - A Black Day for Planet Earth.

Japanese: Ide yo Shenron! Saiyajin Tsui ni Chikyū Tōchaku (いでよ神龍！サイヤ人ついに地球到着)

Goku’s training is complete, so the gang summons the Eternal Dragon to wish him back to life. There’s only one day left before the Saiyans arrive. Unfortunately, it will take Goku two days to return!
name: Counting Down

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Unbelievable! Saibaimen, Born of the Soil - The Battle Begins... Goku Where Are You?

Japanese: (んなバカな！土から生まれたサイバイマン)

Vegeta and Nappa mark their arrival with the destruction of an entire city! When the Z-Fighters confront them, the heroes must face an onslaught of Saibamen under the command of the Saiyans.
name: The Darkest Day

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Yamucha Dies! The Terror of the Saibaimen - The Saibamen Strike.

Japanese: Yamucha Shisu! Osoru Beshi Saibaiman (ヤムチャ死す！おそるべしサイバイマン)

Krillin, Piccolo, and Gohan stand face to face with the sinister Saiyans and their diabolical henchmen. The villains have already proven terrifyingly powerful. Can Earth’s heroes hold out until Goku arrives?
name: Saibamen Attack!

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Farewell Ten-san! Chaozu's Suicide Strategy - Nappa... The Invincible?

Japanese: Sayonara Tensan! Chaozu no Sutemi no Senpō (さよなら天さん！餃子の捨て身の戦法)

Enraged over the loss of Yamcha, Krillin unleashes a powerful attack that destroys the maniacal Saibamen once and for all. Now Earth’s defenders must battle the Saiyans themselves - starting with Nappa.
name: The Power of Nappa

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Tenshinhan Cries Out!! This is My Final Kikoho - Tien Goes All Out!!

Japanese: Tenshinhan Zekkyō!! Kore ga Saigo no Kikōhō Da (天津飯絶叫!!これが最後の気功砲だ)

Chiaotzu sacrifices himself to save his friends from Nappa, but when the smoke clears, the villain still stands! Luckily, Tien has one trick left that could forever silence the Saiyan warrior!
name: Sacrifice

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: An Intense Three-Hour Delay! The Kinto Un Bullet-Express.

Japanese: Hitasura Matte Sanjikan! Dangan Hikō no Kintoun (ひたすら待って3時間！弾丸飛行の筋斗雲)

Vegeta has called a halt to the fighting, and Nappa uses the time to go on a rampage! Meanwhile, Goku reaches the end of Snake Way and races to rejoin his friends - but is he already too late?
name: Nappa's Rampage

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Leave it to Me! Gohan's Great Burst of Anger - Time's Up!

Japanese: Boku ni Makasete! Gohan - Ikari no Daibakuhatsu (ぼくにまかせて！悟飯・怒りの大爆発)

Piccolo, Gohan, and Krillin do their best to stop the Saiyans from finding the Dragon Balls. Meanwhile, Goku rushes back to Earth on the Flying Nimbus, armed with more power than ever before!
name: Nimbus Speed

description:
Original English or Japanese title:

English: Ferocity of the Saiyans! Kami-sama and Piccolo Both Die - The Return of Goku.

Japanese: Saiyajin no Mōi! Kamisama mo Pikkoro mo Shinda (サイヤ人の猛威！神様もピッコロも死んだ)

Piccolo makes the ultimate sacrifice to save Gohan from the rampaging Saiyans. Just when all seems lost, Goku returns to Earth with an incredible new level of power and confronts the invaders.
name: Goku's Arrival

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Father is Awesome! Kaio-ken, the Ultimate Finishing Technique - Goku Strikes Back.

Japanese: Tōsan Sugē ya! Kyūkyoku no Hissatsuwaza - Kaiōken (父さんすげぇや！究極の必殺技・界王拳)

Locked in battle with the Saiyans, Goku gives Nappa a brutal demonstration of the training he received from King Kai. Broken and defeated, Nappa must now face the ferocious wrath of Vegeta!
name: Lesson Number One

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: A Hot, Unbounded Battle! Goku vs. Vegeta - Goku vs. Vegeta... A Saiyan Duel!

Japanese: Genkai o Koeta Atsui Tatakai! Gokū Tai Bejīta (限界を超えた熱い戦い！悟空対ベジータ)

Goku decides to take on mighty Vegeta all by himself! The two appear evenly matched, but both are hiding their true strength. The epic battle is underway - which mighty warrior will claim victory?
name: Goku vs. Vegeta

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Now, Goku! A Final Technique with Everything on the Line.

Japanese: Ima da Gokū! Subete o Kaketa Saigo no Ōwaza (いまだ悟空！すべてを賭けた最後の大技)

Vegeta and Goku continue trading brutal blows, but the action intensifies when Vegeta reveals the secret power of the Saiyans: the ability to transform into a giant, planet-destroying ape!
name: Saiyan Sized Secret

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Battle Power Times Ten!! Vegeta's Great Metamorphosis - Vegeta... Saiyan Style!

Japanese: Sentōryoku Jūbai!! Bejīta Daihenshin (戦闘力10倍!!ベジータ大変身)

Goku feels the brunt of Vegeta’s fully-realized Saiyan power! Earth’s greatest hero is left with no choice except to use the Spirit Bomb. If his attack fails, he may find himself completely doomed!
name: Spirit Bomb Away!

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Don't Die, Father!! This is the Depth of Gohan's Power - Stop Vegeta Now!

Japanese: Shinanaide Tōsan!! Kore ga Gohan no Sokojikara (死なないで父さん!!これが悟飯の底力)

With Goku caught in the clutches of the giant ape Vegeta, Krillin attacks with his Destructo Disk! When his effort falls short, an unlikely hero steps out of the shadows!
name: Hero in the Shadows

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Shoot, Kuririn! The Genki Dama, Packed with Hope.

Japanese: Ute Kuririn! Negai o Kometa Genkidama (撃てクリリン！願いをこめた元気玉)

Goku passes the power of the Spirit Bomb to Krillin, who - with King Kai’s guidance - launches the bomb at Vegeta. The Saiyan is sent flying into the sky, but is the evil warrior really gone for good?
name: Krillin's Offensive

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Cause a Miracle! Son Gohan, the Super Saiyan - The Battle Ends.

Japanese: Kiseki o Okose! Sūpā Saiyajin Son Gohan (奇跡を起こせ！スーパーサイヤ人孫悟飯)

Vegeta is crushed beneath the full weight of Gohan’s giant ape form! With the Saiyan battered and defeated, Krillin moves to finish the Saiyan with a final blow - but Goku has other plans.
name: Mercy

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: We're Off Into Space! The Star of Hope is Piccolo's Homeland - A New Goal... Namek.

Japanese: Tobidase Uchū e! Kibō no Hoshi wa Pikkoro no Furusato (飛び出せ宇宙へ！希望の星はピッコロの故郷)

The gang mourns the loss of Yamcha, Tien, Chiaotzu, and Piccolo. With Kami gone, Earth’s Dragon Balls have disappeared. Will the surviving heroes find a way to wish their fallen friends back to life?
name: Picking Up the Pieces

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Mysterious Yunzabit! The Search for Kami-sama's Spaceship.

Japanese: Nazo no Yunzabitto! Kamisama no Uchūsen o Sagase (謎のユンザビット！神様の宇宙船を探せ)

Bulma accidentally destroys the Saiyan spaceship! Luckily, Mr. Popo reveals the existence of another ship that may be able to reach Namek. Can they find it in time, and will the old ship still work if they do?
name: Plans for Departure

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Blast-off for Planet Namek! The Terror Awaiting Gohan & Co. - Journey to Namek.

Japanese: Namekkusei Iki Hasshin! Gohantachi o Matsu Kyōfu (ナメック星行き発進！悟飯たちを待つ恐怖)

Goku, Krillin, and Gohan prepare for the return of the Saiyans. Meanwhile, Bulma and Mr. Popo search for a second spaceship capable of transporting her to Planet Namek.
name: Nursing Wounds

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Friends or Foes? Children of the Mysterious Giant Spaceship.

Japanese: Teki ka Mikata ka? Nazo no Kyodai Uchūsen no Kodomotachi (敵か味方か？謎の巨大宇宙船の子供たち)

Gohan, Bulma, and Krillin blast off for Planet Namek in search of the magic Dragon Balls, but their journey quickly turns chaotic when they encounter a bizarre situation in the vacuum of space!
name: Friends or Foes?

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Honest to Goodness? There Lies Namek, Planet of Hope

Japanese: Honto ni Honto? Are ga Kibō no Namekkusei (ホントにホント？あれが希望のナメック星)

Bulma, Gohan, and Krillin are mistaken for friends of Frieza and taken prisoner by an angry army of children! To regain their freedom and continue on their mission, the gang must convince the kids of their innocence.
name: Held Captive

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Kind-hearted Aliens — There's the Wu Xing Qiu Already.

Japanese: Shinsetsu na Uchūjin — Ikinari Atta yo Ūshinchū (親切な宇宙人いきなりあったよ五星球)

A near-fatal crash landing turns out to have a silver lining when Bulma, Gohan, and Krillin are rescued by two friendly Namekians who agree to help them locate the seven Dragon Balls.
name: Friends or Foes?

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Planet Freeza No. 79 — Vegeta Recovers!! - Hunt for a Dragon Ball.

Japanese: Wakusei Furīza Nanbā Nanajūkyū — Fukkatsu no Bejīta!! (惑星フリーザNO.79復活のベジータ!!)

Gohan, Krillin, and Bulma continue their search for the Dragon Balls with the help of their new friend Zaacro. Back on Earth, Goku has escaped from the hospital to begin training for his upcoming re-match with Vegeta.
name: The Search Continues

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: The Dragon Balls are All Found! Piccolo-san Will Also Come Back to Life - Who's Who?!

Japanese: Sorotta zo Doragon Bōru! Pikkorosan mo Ikikaeru (そろったぞ神龍球！ピッコロさんも生き返る)

As Bulma, Krillin, and Gohan close in on the last of the Dragon Balls, they uncover a shocking secret about their Namekian friends. Meanwhile, Goku works to build up his strength, and Vegeta sets his sights on revenge!
name: A Friendly Surprise

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: A Tough New Enemy! Freeza, Emperor of the Universe - Touchdown on Namek.

Japanese: Arata na Kyōteki! Uchū no Teiō Furīza (あらたな強敵！宇宙の帝王フリーザ)

Bulma, Krillin, and Gohan finally continue their quest to locate all seven Dragon balls. Unfortunately, the gang soon discovers that they aren't the only ones seeking the magical orbs!
name: Brood of Evil

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Vegeta's Ambition! I am the Greatest Warrior in the Universe!! - Face-off on Namek.

Japanese: Yabō no Bejīta! Uchūichi no Senshi wa Ore Da!! (野望のベジータ！宇宙一の戦士はオレだ!!)

Krillin, Gohan, and Bulma are horrified to see Vegeta’s space pod land on Planet Namek, but the Saiyan Prince is the least of their problems. Yet another epically evil villain has come to Namek in search of the Dragon Balls!
name: Frieza Strikes!

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Goku's Power Unleashed!! Six Days to the Far End of the Galaxy - The Ruthless Frieza.

Japanese: Gokū Pawā Zenkai!! Ginga no Hate made Muikakan (悟空パワー全開!!銀河の果てまで6日間)

With the odds are rapidly mounting against them, Krillin and Gohan will need some serious help if they hope to recover the Dragon Balls from Frieza and his henchmen.
name: Defying Orders

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Surprise Attack!! The Elder's Target was the Scouters - The Nameks versus Frieza.

Japanese: Ihyō o Tsuita Kōgeki!! Chōrō no Nerai wa Sukautā (意表をついた攻撃!!長老の狙いはスカウター)

Krillin and Gohan get their first glimpse of Frieza’s cruelty as the villain unleashes his henchmen upon an unsuspecting Namek village. Frieza wants the fifth Dragon Ball, and he is prepared to learn its location by any means necessary!
name: Namek's Defense

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Gohan in Peril! A Pursuing Dodoria Summons Death - Escape from Dodoria.

Japanese: Gohan Ayaushi! Shi o Yobu Tsuisekisha Dodoria (悟飯危うし！死を呼ぶ追跡者ドドリア)

Gohan risks his life to rescue a Namek boy from the clutches of Frieza’s evil henchmen. Now Gohan and Krillin have an even bigger problem on their hands: Dodoria is chasing them, and he won’t stop until he has his revenge!
name: The Hunted

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Dodoria Dies by Explosion! Vegeta's Fearsome Shockwave - Secrets Revealed.

Japanese: Bakushi Dodoria! Bejīta no Osoru Beki Shōgekiha (爆死ドドリア！ベジータの恐るべき衝撃波)

Dodoria’s search for Krillin and Gohan brings him face to face with an unexpected foe - Vegeta! The Saiyan prince has a score to settle with Dodoria, and the time for a final showdown between these two powerful villains has arrived!
name: The Prince Fights Back

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Escape From a Burning Planet!! A Life-or-Death Kamehame-Ha - A Collision Course.

Japanese: Moeru Wakusei kara no Dasshutsu!! Inochigake no Kamehameha (燃える惑星からの脱出!!命がけのカメハメ波)

Goku’s journey to Namek takes an unexpected detour when his spaceship is knocked off course by an asteroid! Goku has to act fast to get his ship back on track because he’s headed straight for the fiery center of a star!
name: Unexpected Problem

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Courage Times One Hundred! The Warriors Gathered Under Kaio - Stay Away From Frieza.

Japanese: Yūki Hyakubai! Kaiō no Moto ni Shūketsu Suru Senshitachi (勇気百倍！界王の下に集結する戦士たち)

With his new abilities, Vegeta quickly tracks down and forcefully acquires another Dragon Ball. Now, there is only one magic orb left to find, and Dende knows who has it - the Eldest Namekian!
name: Vegeta has a Ball

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Listen to Me, Goku! Hands Off Freeza.

Japanese: Kike Gokū yo! Furīza ni wa Te o Dasu na (聞け悟空よ！フリーザには手を出すな)

King Kai becomes concerned after learning that Goku is on a collision course with the ruthless Frieza. Meanwhile, back on Planet Namek, the battle between Vegeta and Zarbon has begun!
name: The Past and Future

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Nothing but Goosebumps! The Handsome Warrior Zarbon's Devilish Transformation - Zarbon Transformed.

Japanese: Hotondo Torihada! Bisenshi Zābon no Akuma no Henshin (ほとんど鳥肌！美戦士ザーボンの悪魔の変身)

Vegeta’s latest battle heats up as Zarbon reveals his true power: the ability to transform into a monstrous beast! With his increased size and strength, Zarbon seems ready to turn the lights out on the Saiyan Prince - permanently!
name: Zarbon's Surprise

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Defend the Star of Hope!! Kuririn's Astonishing Power-Up - The Eldest Namek.

Japanese: Kibō no Hoshi o Mamore!! Kuririn Kyōi no Pawā Appu (希望の星を守れ!!クリリン驚異のパワーUP)

When Krillin speaks to the Eldest Namekian, he gets a double surprise! Not only does he receive a Dragon Ball, but the sleeping powers within him are awoken! Will Krillin’s incredible new strength be enough to save his friends?
name: Guru's Gift

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Back from the Brink of Death — The Miracle Man, Vegeta - Get Vegeta!

Japanese: Shi no Fuchi kara Yomigaetta — Kiseki no Otoko - Bejīta (死の淵からよみがえった奇跡の男・ベジータ)

Yamcha, Tien, and Chiaotzu continue training, but their workout gets intense when Piccolo challenges them all to a three-on-one bout! Back on Namek, Frieza’s henchmen try to revive Vegeta in order to obtain the missing Dragon Ball.
name: Piccolo vs. Everyone

description:
Original English and Japanese title;

English: An Enormous Battle Power!! Freeza's Scheme is Shattered - Vegeta Revived.

Japanese: Dodekai Sentōryoku!! Kudakechiru Furīza no Inbō (どでかい戦闘力!!砕け散るフリーザの陰謀)

Vegeta escapes from the clutches of Frieza, and steals the Dragon Balls in the process! Elsewhere, Goku’s journey through space grows perilous as his ship is caught in a powerful magnetic storm!
name: Zarbon's Mission

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: I'm Back to My Old Self Again!! Goku Under 100-Times Super-Gravity - A Heavy Burden.

Japanese: Genki ga Modotta zo!! Hyakubai Chōjūryoku no Naka no Gokū (元気が戻ったぞ!!100倍超重力の中の悟空)

Krillin returns from his meeting with the Eldest Namekian only to be greeted by a pair of unwelcome visitors: Vegeta and Zarbon! Meanwhile, Gohan discovers the seventh and final Dragon Ball!
name: Gohan, the Hunted

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Freeza's Secret Weapon! The Devilish Ginyu Special Corps - Immortality Denied.

Japanese: Furīza no Himitsu Heiki! Akuma no Ginyū Tokusentai (フリーザの秘密兵器！悪魔のギニュー特戦隊)

The Ginyu Force has been dispatched to Planet Namek to help search for the Dragon Balls. Unaware of this new threat, Krillin and Gohan struggle to keep the seventh Dragon Ball from falling into Vegeta’s evil hands.
name: Unknown Enemies

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Watch Out, Bulma!! The Si Xing Qiu Falls into Freeza's Clutches - Big Trouble for Bulma.

Japanese: Buruma ga Abunai!! Sūshinchū wa Furīza no Te ni (ブルマが危ない!!四星球はフリーザの手に)

While Krillin and Gohan visit the Eldest Namekian, they leave the seventh Dragon Ball their hidden camp. When the Dragon Ball mysteriously disappears, Bulma must embark on a daring underwater adventure to get it back!
name: Destination: Guru

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Charge!! The Kaio-ken and Kamehame-Ha of an Indomitable Spirit - Scramble for the Dragon Balls.

Japanese: Gekitotsu da!! Fukutsu no Tōshi no Kaiōken to Kamehameha (激突だ!!不屈の闘志の界王拳とカメハメ波)

Bulma is taken hostage by Frieza’s evil henchmen, who force her to lead them on an underwater quest for the Dragon Balls. Without Gohan and Krillin to save her, she’ll have to outsmart her captors — or wind up sleeping with the fishes!
name: Bulma's Big Day

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: The Great Battle Approaches! The Ginyu Special Corps Now Takes the Stage!! - Arrival of the Ginyu Force.

Japanese: Semaru Chōkessen! Ginyū Tokusentai Tadaima Sanjō!! (迫る超決戦！ギニュー特戦隊只今参上!!)

Krillin and Gohan complete their journey to Guru’s house, but little do they know, Vegeta is hot on their trail! Can Guru unlock Gohan’s hidden powers in time to hold off the rampaging Saiyan’s wrath?
name: Hidden Power

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Goku on Final Approach! Smash Through Freeza's Dragnet - Elite Fighters of the Universe... The Ginyu Force.

Japanese: Gokū ga Daisekkin! Furīza no Hōimō o Buchiyabure (悟空が大接近！フリーザの包囲網をぶち破れ)

The Ginyu Force has arrived on Planet Namek! Now, Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan must form an uneasy alliance as they stand face to face with five of the fiercest warriors in the universe!
name: New Ally, New Problem

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Super-Magic or Just a Trick!? Mr. Ghurd is Angry! - Time Tricks and Body Binds.

Japanese: Chōmajutsu ka Torikku ka!? Misutā Gurudo ga Okotta zo! (超魔術かトリックか!?MR.グルドが怒ったぞ！)

The battle with the Ginyu Force begins, as Gohan and Krillin launch a barrage of explosive energy blasts at Guldo! The Heroes are rendered helpless by Guldo’s Mind Blind technique, and this time, there is no one to save them!
name: Guldo's Mind Binds

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: The Savage ReaCoom!! He's Bad, He's Strong, He's Outrageous - No Refuge From Recoome.

Japanese: Mōi Rikūmu!! Warukute Tsuyokute Tondemonai Yatsu (猛攻リクーム!!悪くて強くてとんでもない奴)

The battle with Guldo may be over, but the real nightmare is just beginning! Recoome, the most massive member of the Ginyu Force, is ready to fight, and even the mighty Vegeta’s attacks have no effect on this monstrous foe!
name: Recoome Unleashed

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Don't Die, Gohan! Goku Finally Touches Down on the Battlefield - Enter Goku.

Japanese: Shinu na Gohan! Gokū, Tsui ni Kessenjō ni Tōchaku Da (死ぬな悟飯！悟空、ついに決戦場に到着だ)

With Krillin and Vegeta both out of commission, only Gohan remains to carry on the fight against Recoome! The young Saiyan must summon every ounce of his strength and courage in order to face this powerful foe.
name: Let the Battle Begin

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Uncommon Strength!! Son Goku, the Legendary Super Saiyan - Goku... Super Saiyan?

Japanese: Ketahazure no Tsuyosa!! Densetsu no Sūpā Saiyajin Son Gokū (ケタ外れの強さ!!伝説の超サイヤ人孫悟空)

Goku has arrived on Planet Namek, and without a second to lose! Gohan and Krillin are hanging by a thread, held at the mercy of the Ginyu Force! Has Goku’s training in 100-times gravity prepared him to face these powerful foes?
name: Goku's New Power

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Lightning Balls of Red and Blue! Jheese and Butta Attack Goku - Goku... Super Saiyan?

Japanese: Aka to Ao no Raitoningu Bōru! Jīsu to Bāta ga Gokū o Osō (赤と青の光球！ジースとバータが悟空を襲う)

As Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan look on, Goku easily deflects the attacks of Jeice and Burter, two of the Force’s fiercest warriors. Could Goku have become what Vegeta thought was only a legend: a Super Saiyan?
name: A Legend Revealed

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: At Last, a Direct Confrontation!! Captain Ginyu Takes the Field.

Japanese: Tsui ni Chokusetsu Taiketsu!! Ginyū Taichō no Odemashi Da (ついに直接対決!!ギニュー隊長のおでましだ)

When Goku proves too much for Burter and Jeice to handle on their own, Jeice retreats in search of reinforcements. Now, the real test for Goku and his newly-acquired powers is about to begin as Captain Ginyu enters the fight!
name: Ginyu Assault

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Incredible Force!! Did You See Goku's Full Power?

Japanese: Susamajii Hakuryoku!! Mita ka, Gokū no Furu Pawā (凄まじい迫力!!見たか、悟空のフルパワー)

As the battle between Goku and Captain Ginyu rages on, Gohan and Krillin steal the unguarded Dragon Balls from Frieza’s ship. It’s a race against time, and our heroes must unlock the power of the Dragon Balls before it’s too late!
name: Incredible Force!

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: What of the Battle's Outcome!? Freeza's Evil Hand Closes Around the Grand Elder.

Japanese: Tatakai no Yukue!? Saichōrō ni Semaru Furīza no Ma no Te (闘いの行方!?最長老に迫るフリーザの魔の手)

Goku astounds Captain Ginyu with his amazing new powers, but the Captain still has a few tricks up his sleeve! Meanwhile, Frieza arrives at the home of the Eldest Namek and begins a battle with the noble warrior, Nail!
name: Frieza Approaches

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Surprise!! Goku is Ginyu and Ginyu is Goku.

Japanese: Bikkuri!! Gokū ga Ginyū de Ginyū ga Gokū (ビックリ!!悟空がギニューでギニューが悟空)

In an attempt to save the Elder, Nail fights a hopeless battle against the ruthless Frieza. Meanwhile, finding himself no match for Goku’s superior abilities, Captain Ginyu unleashes his ultimate attack, the Body Switch Technique!
name: Goku is Ginyu and Ginyu is Goku

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Come Forth, Super Shen Long!! Grant Me My Wish.

Japanese: Ide yo Sūpā Shenron!! Boku no Negai o Kanaetamae (出でよ超神龍!!ボクの願いをかなえたまえ)

Armed with the Dragon Radar, Gohan and Krillin recover the seven Dragon Balls from their hiding places. But before they can summon the Eternal Dragon to make their wish, they are confronted by a powerful new enemy - Goku?!
name: Calling the Eternal Dragon

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: That Ain't Me! Gohan, Don't Lose Your Nerve, Hit Your Father!!

Japanese: Yatsu wa Ora ja Nē! Gohan Bibiru na Chichi o Ute!! (奴はオラじゃネェ！悟飯びびるな父を撃て!!)

After taking control of Goku’s body, Captain Ginyu turns his attention to Gohan and Krillin! With Goku trapped in the Captain’s broken body, it’s up to Gohan to stop the rampaging Ginyu!
name: Gohan, Defeat Your Dad!

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Whoops!! Ginyu Has Turned Into a Frog.

Japanese: Daigosan!! Ginyū ga Kaeru ni Natchatta (大誤算!!ギニューがカエルになっちゃった)

As the bout between Captain Ginyu and Vegeta heats up, Goku summons the last of his strength and tricks his foe into reversing the Body Switch Technique. Now, Goku, Krillin, and Gohan must join forces with Vegeta for the battle with Frieza.
name: Captain Ginyu... The Frog

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Thou Who Hast Gathered the Seven Balls... Now Speak Forth the Password!

Japanese: Nanatsu no Tama o Soroeshi Mono yo... Sā Aikotoba o Ie! (七ッの玉を揃えし者よ…さあ合言葉を言え！)

Having acquired all seven Namekian Dragon Balls, Krillin and Gohan are ready to summon the dragon and make their wish. There’s just one problem: they don’t know the password!
name: Password is Porunga

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Kami-sama Also Returns to Life! Piccolo is Resurrected by Super Shen Long.

Japanese: Kamisama mo Ikikaetta! Sūpā Shen Long de Pikkoro ga Fukkatsu (神様も生き返った！超神龍でピッコロが復活)

With the help of young Dende, Krillin and Gohan learn they will be granted three wishes! But even as Krillin and Gohan call upon the dragon, Vegeta races to the scene on a mission to wish for immortality!
name: Piccolo's Return

description:
Original English and Japanese title:

English: Birth of the Mightiest Warrior!? Nail and Piccolo Merge.

Japanese: Saikyō Senshi no Tanjō ka!? Neiru to Pikkoro ga Gattai (最強戦士の誕生か!?ネイルとピッコロが合体)

With the Dragon Balls gone and his plan in ruins, Frieza unleashes his fury upon Vegeta, Gohan, and Krillin. Elsewhere, the newly-revived Piccolo finds himself on Planet Namek. Will his arrival be enough to turn the tide?
name: The Fusion
